pli-tv-bu-vb-pc15:2.1.8: Sp-yoj.1.112: Cammakhaṇḍoti ettha cammaṁyeva ante khaṇḍattā chinnattā cammakhaṇḍoti vuccati, “Here cammakhaṇḍa is just a hide. Because it is cut up within and made of pieces, it called a cammakhaṇḍa.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc15:2.3.5: Sp.2.118: Kenaci palibuddhaṃ hotīti vuḍḍhatarabhikkhūissariyayakkhasīhavāḷamigakaṇhasappādīsu yena kenaci senāsanaṃ palibuddhaṃ hoti, “Kenaci palibuddhaṃ hoti: by whatever the furniture is obstructed, such as the authority of more senior monks, a spirit, a lion, a wild beast, or a black snake.”
